aom.scripting.xs.kb

Class Unit

  • Object
    • Unit

  • public class Unit
extends Object
    This class provides a collection of KB commands concerning Units and Protounits.
    See Also:
    AoM Reference or AoT Reference for a complete list of all unit constants and more.>
    Author
    Mythic_Freak - mythic.freak[a]gmail.com

    • Method Detail

      • kbGetPopCapAddition

        public int kbGetPopCapAddition(int player,
                      int baseUnitTypeID)
        Returns amount of pop cap addition provided by the given unit type. This only works on base types.

      • kbGetPopSlots

        public int kbGetPopSlots(int player,
                int baseUnitTypeID)
        Returns the number of pop slots this unit takes. This only works on base types.

      • kbGetPopulationSlotsByUnitTypeID

        public int kbGetPopulationSlotsByUnitTypeID(int playerID,
                                   int unitTypeID)
        Returns the number of pop slots currently occupied by this unit type.

        public int kbFindBestBuildingToRepair(vector position,
                             float distance,
                             float healthRatio,
                             int repairUnderAttackUnitTypeID)
        Returns the id of the best building to repair.

      • kbGetCombatEfficiency

        public float kbGetCombatEfficiency(int playerID1,
                          int unitTypeID1,
                          int playerID2,
                          int unitTypeID2)
        Returns the combat efficiency of the comparison (in terms of playerID1's units).

      • kbLookAtAllUnitsOnMap

        public void kbLookAtAllUnitsOnMap()
        Updates the knowledge base for all players with the latest info. If something's not working, put this in front of it and the problem usually magically disappears.
        See Also:
        xsSetContextPlayer(int player)

      • kbDump

        public void kbDump(int player1,
          int player2)
        KB dump for player2's units from player1's perspective.

              int player2,

        KB dump for player2's units of the given type from player1's perspective.

        public float kbGetProtoUnitAICost(int protoUnitTypeID)
        Returns the AI cost for the given protoUnit type ID.

      • kbGetBuildLimit

        public int kbGetBuildLimit(int player,
                  int baseUnitTypeID)
        Returns the number of the unit type you are allowed to have. This only works on base types. Returns -1 if there is no limit.

      • kbGetRandomEnabledPUID

        public int kbGetRandomEnabledPUID(int unitTypeID,
                         int escrowID)
        Returns a random, valid protounit ID that's of the given type.

      • kbGetBlockPosition

        public vector kbGetBlockPosition(string blockName)
        Returns the position of the given unit. This was intended to only work for cinematic blocks, but it turns out to work fine for every unit.

      • kbGetBlockID

        public int kbGetBlockID(string unitName)
        Returns the UnitID of the given unit. This was intended to only work for cinematic blocks, but it turns out to work fine for every unit.
